org.apache.beam.sdk.util

Class DoFnRunners

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.util.DoFnRunners

  • public class DoFnRunners
extends Object
    Static utility methods that provide DoFnRunner implementations.

    • Method Detail

      • simpleRunner

        public static <InputT,OutputT> DoFnRunner<InputT,OutputT> simpleRunner(PipelineOptions options,
                                                                       DoFn<InputT,OutputT> fn,
                                                                       SideInputReader sideInputReader,
                                                                       DoFnRunners.OutputManager outputManager,
                                                                       TupleTag<OutputT> mainOutputTag,
                                                                       List<TupleTag<?>> sideOutputTags,
                                                                       ExecutionContext.StepContext stepContext,
                                                                       CounterSet.AddCounterMutator addCounterMutator,
                                                                       WindowingStrategy<?,?> windowingStrategy)
        Returns a basic implementation of DoFnRunner that works for most DoFns.

        It invokes DoFn.processElement(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.ProcessContext) for each input.

      • lateDataDroppingRunner

        public static <K,InputT,OutputT,W extends BoundedWindow> DoFnRunner<KeyedWorkItem<K,InputT>,KV<K,OutputT>> lateDataDroppingRunner(PipelineOptions options,
                                                                                                                                  DoFnRunner.ReduceFnExecutor<K,InputT,OutputT,W> reduceFnExecutor,
                                                                                                                                  SideInputReader sideInputReader,
                                                                                                                                  DoFnRunners.OutputManager outputManager,
                                                                                                                                  TupleTag<KV<K,OutputT>> mainOutputTag,
                                                                                                                                  List<TupleTag<?>> sideOutputTags,
                                                                                                                                  ExecutionContext.StepContext stepContext,
                                                                                                                                  CounterSet.AddCounterMutator addCounterMutator,
                                                                                                                                  WindowingStrategy<?,W> windowingStrategy)
        Returns an implementation of DoFnRunner that handles late data dropping.

        It drops elements from expired windows before they reach the underlying DoFn.

      • createDefault
